original: mahāmudrābhiṣeka - sādhyatvānmahārthām śrāvakādijñāna sādhāraṇyādasamām tryadhvasamatvena nirvi- kāratvāt śivām ādimadhyāntakalyāṇīmiti ādirānandajñānam, madhye paramānanda- jñānam, ante ca viramānandajñānaṃ teṣāṃ kalyāṇīṃ sahajajñānarūpādikāmata eva uttamā- nandatrayānupalambhasvarūpatvāt tathā coktam- sukhaṃ jñānaṃ jñānamūrtiḥ atha gopate mūrti parvīya sevayati, parvopasevayet amṛtakaṇikā sahitā ānandatrayabhedena catuthaṃ tena lakṣayet trayāṇāṃ nopalambhatvāt sahajaṃ tena gadyate sarva kalyāṇatāṃ yāti raviṇābjaprakāśanāt ityādivistaraḥ nānātantropalakṣitamahāsukhākārasahajānandasukhasya nāmnā samyakjñānaṃ nāmasaṅgotiḥ sahajarūpeṇa tāṃ dhārayiṣyāmi advayabhāvaṃ kariṣyā- mīti vakṣyamāṇena sambandhaḥ yā'tīterbhāṣitā buddherbhāṣiṣyante hyanāgatāḥ pratyutpannāśca saṃbuddhāyāṃ bhāṣante punaḥ punaḥ yātītairiti yā nāmasaṅgītiratīteḥ śrutacintāyukterbhāṣitā '
analyzed: mahāmudrā abhiṣeka sādhya tvāt mahārthām śrāvaka ādi jñāna sādhāraṇyāt asamām tri adhva samatvena nirvi kāra tvāt śivām ādi madhya anta kalyāṇīm iti ādiḥ ānanda jñānam madhye parama raviṇā abja prakāśanāt iti ādi vistaraḥ nānā tantra upalakṣita mahā sukha ākāra sahaja ānanda sukhasya nāmnā samyakjñānam nāma saṅgotiḥ sahaja rūpeṇa tām dhārayiṣyāmi advaya bhāvam kariṣyāmi

original: pratiśrutkarūpeṇā- dhigatā anāgatā bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantagatā bhāṣiṣyante tathaivādhigamiṣyanti 'pratyutpannāśca vārtamānikā bhāvanāyogayuktā bhāṣante tathaivādhigacchanti etena māyājāla iti māyājāle māyājālābhisambodhilakṣaṇe, tanyate vyutpādyata iti tantram, mahacca tattantrañceti mahātantraṃ mahāsukhajñānamityarthaḥ uktañca— tantraṃ prabandhamākhyātaṃ saṃsāraṃ tantramiṣyate tantraṃ guhyaṃ rahasyākhyamuttaraṃ tantramucyate iti yā nāmasaṅgītiḥ saṃpragīyate svayameva buddhayate mahāvajjradharairjñānakāyātmakairmahā- mantradhāribhiḥ pañcajñānātmaka sukhadhāribhirameyairvikalpāgocarairhṛṣṭaiḥ sahajasvabhāveḥ ahaṃ caināṃ dhārayiṣyāmyā niryāṇād dṛḍhāśayaḥ yathā bhavāmyahaṃ nātha sarvasaṃbuddhaguhyadhṛk labdhatvāt bhāṣante ca pratiśrutko vigatā pratyutpannaśca deśitamiti māyājālamahātantre ramaya tatra te nāsti niryāṇaṃ ca ga āryamanjuśrī nāmasaṅgītiḥ aham ( miti ) tāmahaṃ caināṃ dhārayiṣyāmi advayībhāvaṃ kariṣyāmītyarthaḥ kiyatkālam ma niryāṇaṃ yāvat dvayayutaṣoḍaśaśataśvāsākṣaratvaprāpaṇena dvādaśabhūmīśvaro na bhavāmi tāvatkālamityarthaḥ dṛḍhaḥ 'sāro'cyuta āśayaḥ sukhaprakṛtiryasya sa tathā ahamuktārthaḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ yadguhyaṃ paramākṣaracaturthabindu staddharatīti yathā prakāśayiṣye sattvānāṃ yathāśayaviśeṣataḥ aśeṣakleśanāśāya aśeṣājñānahānaye' prakāśayiṣya iti evaṃ bindudhṛg bhūtvā satvānāṃ bhavyānāmāśaya viśeṣataḥ vajrapāṇistathāgatam kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvā prahnakāyaḥ sthito'grataḥ iti adhyeṣaṇāgāthāḥ ṣoḍaśa evamiti evaṃ evaṃkārasvarūpaṃ tathāgataṃ vyākhyātāra madhyeṣyāmukhīkṛtya, guhyendraḥ analyzed: pratiśrutka rūpeṇa adhigatāḥ anāgatāḥ bhāvanā prakarṣa paryanta gatāḥ bhāṣiṣyante tathā eva adhigamiṣyanti pratyutpannāḥ ca vārtamānikāḥ bhāvanā yoga yuktāḥ bhāṣante tathā eva adhigacchanti etena uktam ca tantram prabandham ākhyātam saṃsāram tantram iṣyate tantram guhyam rahasya ākhyam uttaram tantram ucyate iti yā nāma saṅgītiḥ saṃpragīyate svayam eva buddhayate mahā vajjra dharaiḥ ārya manjuśrī nāma saṅgītiḥ aham miti tām aham ca enām dhārayiṣyāmi advayībhāvam kariṣyāmi iti arthaḥ kiyatkālam niryāṇam yāvat dvaya yuta ṣoḍaśa śata śvāsa akṣara tva prāpaṇena prakṛtitaḥ yathā prakāśayiṣye tathā prakāśayatu iti pūrveṇa sambandhaḥ aśeṣa kleśa nāśāya sarva cyuti duḥkha khaṇḍanāya aśeṣa ajñāna hānaye vikalpa vāsanā hataye evam adhyeṣya guhya indraḥ ṣoḍaśa sāgho saṃbuddhānām bindum aśeṣaḥ ha ānaya tathāgataḥ prativacanam atha śākyamuniḥ bhagavān saṃbuddhaḥ dvipada uttamaḥ nirṇamayya āyatām sphītām sva jihvām sva mukhāt śubhām

original: śākyamuniḥ samyaksambuddho mahāvairocano vajradharo yathoktaṃ śrīrigibhara llimahātantra - bhago śuddhodana mahārājā alli prakāśitaḥ rigistatra mahāmāyā prajñopāyātmakaṃ jagat vajrasatvastu siddhārthaḥ paramānando mahāsukhaḥ iti mahāmudrā mahāprajñā, tadyogād bhagavān uktañca śrīheva - bhañjanaṃ bhagamākhyātaṃ kleśa mārādibhañjanāt prajñābadhyāśca te kleśāstasmātprajñā bhagocyate iti uṣṇīṣādiṣaṭcakreṣu jñānakāyāvabodhāt saṃbuddhaḥ saṃvṛtiparamārthajñānadvayena dvipadenottamaḥ śreṣṭho dvipadottamaḥ athavā 'dvipadena vajramaṇiśikharoṣṇīṣāpratiṣṭha-pratiṣṭhā- dvayena uttamo dvādaśabhūmīśvaraḥ
analyzed: śākyamuniḥ samyaksambuddhaḥ mahāvairocanaḥ vajradharaḥ yathā uktam śrī rigi bhara lli mahātantra śuddhodana mahā rājā alli prakāśitaḥ rigiḥ tatra mahāmāyā prajñā upāya ātmakam jagat vajra dvipadena pratiṣṭhā dvayena uttamaḥ dvādaśa bhūmi īśvaraḥ

original: iti prathama cakrasyeyamanuśaṃsā ekādaśa padāni || punara paramiyaṃ vajrapāṇe vajradhara nāmasaṅgītiḥ supariśuddhā, paryavadātā, sarvajñajñānakāyavāṅmanoguhyabhūtā, sarvatathāgatānāṃ buddhabodhiḥ, dharmadhātugatiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmabhisamayaḥ, sarvatathāgatānāmanuttaraḥ, sugatānām, sarvamārabala parājayo jinānām, daśabalabalitā sarvadaśa- balānām, sarvajñatā sarvajñajñānānām, āgamaḥ sarvadharmāṇām, samudāgamaḥ sarva buddhadharmāṇām, vimalasupariśuddhapuṇyajñānasaṃbhārapari pūrī sarva mahābodhi- sattvānām, prasūtiḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām, kṣetraṃ sarvadevamanuṣyasampatteḥ, pratiṣṭhā mahāyānasya, saṃbhavo bodhisattvacaryāyāḥ, niṣṭhā samyagāryaṃmāgaṃsya ' nikaṣo vimuktīnām, utpatti' nirvāṇa māgaṃsya, anucchedastathāgatavaṃśasya, pravṛddhirmahābodhi 'sattvakulagotrasya, nigrahaḥ sarvaparapravādinām, vidhvaṃsanaṃ sarvatīthikānām, parājayaścaturmārabalacamū senāyāḥ saṃgrahaḥ sarvasattvā- nām, āryamāgaṃ paripākaḥ sarvaniryāṇayāyinām, samādhiścaturbrahmavihāra- vihāriṇām, dhyānamekāgracittānām, yogaḥ kāyavāṅmano'bhiyuktānām visaṃyogaḥ sarvasaṃyojanānām, prahāṇaṃ sarvakleśopakleśānām, 'vyupaśamaḥ sarvāvaraṇānām, vimuktiḥ sarvabandhanānām, mokṣaḥ 'sarvopadhīnām, śāntiḥ sarvacittopaplavānām, ākaraḥ sarvasampattīnām, parihāṇiḥ sarva- vipattīnām, vidhānaṃ sarvāpāyadvārāṇām, satpayo vimukti purasya, apravṛttiḥ saṃsāracakrasya pravartanaṃ dharmacakrasya, ucchritacchatradhvaja patākā tathāgataśāsanasya, adhiṣṭhānaṃ sarvadharma deśanāyāḥ, kṣiprasiddhimantramukhacaryā - cāriṇāṃ bodhisattvānām, bhāvanādhigamaḥ prajñāpāramitābhiyuktānāṃ, bodhisattvānām, śūnyatāprati vedho'dvayaprati 'vedabhāvanābhiyuktānām, niṣpattiḥ sarvapāramitāsaṃbhārasya, pariśuddhiḥ sarvabhūmipāramitā pari- pūryāṇām, prativedhaḥ samyakcaturāryasatyānām, sarvadharmaika cittaprativedhaścatu:- yāvacchandaparisamāptiḥ smṛtyupasthānānām, sarvabuddhaguṇānāmiyaṃ nāmasaṅgītiḥ

original: iti dvitīyacakrasyeyamanuśaṃsā padāni dvāpañcāśat || punaraparaṃ vajrapāṇe vajradhara iyaṃ nāmasaṅgītiḥ sarvasattvānāma- sarvasattvānāṃ sarvāpāya- śeṣakāyavāṅmanaḥ samudācārapāpapraśamanī, viśodhanī, sarvadurgatinivāraṇī, sarvakarmāvaraṇasamucchedanakarī, sarvā- ṣṭakṣaṇasamutpādasyānutpādanakarī, aṣṭamahābhayavyupaśamanakarī, sarvaduḥ- svapna vināśanakarī, sarva durnimittavyapohanakarī, du:śakunavighnavyu- paśamanakarī, sarvamārārikamaṃdūrīkaraṇī, sarvakuśalamūlapuṇyopacayakarī, sarvāyoniso (śo) manasikārasyānutpādanakarī, sarvamadamānadarpāha āryamañjuśrī nāmasaṅgītiḥ
analyzed: iti dvitīya cakrasya iyam anuśaṃsā padāni dvāpañcāśat punar aparam vajrapāṇe vajradharaḥ iyam nāma saṅgītiḥ sarva sattvānām sarva apāya śeṣa kāya vāc manaḥ samudācāra pāpa praśamanī sarva mada māna darpa ahaḥ ārya mañjuśrī nāma saṅgītiḥ

original: ṅkāranirghātanakarī, sarvaduḥkhadaurmanasyānutpādanakarī, sarvatathāgatānāṃ hṛdaya- bhūtā, sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ guhyabhūtā, sarvaṃśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ rahasya- bhūtā, sarvamudrāmantrabhūtā, sarvadharmāna bhilāpyavādināṃ smṛtisaṃprajanyasaṃjananī, anuttaraprajñāmedhākarī, ārogyabaleśvaryaṃ sampatkarī, śrīśubhaśāntikalyāṇa- pravardhanakarī, yaśaḥ kīrtiślokastuti prakāśanakarī, sarvavyādhimahābhaya- vyupaśamanakarī, pūtatarā pūtatarāṇām, pavitratarā pavitratarāṇām, ghanyatamā dhanyatamānām, sarvamāṅgalyatamā sarvamāṅgalyatamānām, śaraṇaṃ śaraṇārthinām, layanaṃ layanārthinām, trāṇaṃ trāṇārthinām, parāyaṇaṃ parāya- ṇānām, dvīpabhūtā dvopārthinām, agatikānāmanuttaragatibhūtā, yānapātra- bhūtā bhavasāgarapāragāminām, mahābhaiṣajyarājabhūtā sarvavyādhinirghātana- tayā, prajñābhūtā heyopādeyabhāva vibhāvanatayā, jñānālokabhūtā sarvatamo- nvakāra kudṛṣṭyapanayanāya, cintā maṇirājabhūtā sarvasattvāśayābhiprāya- paripūraṇāya, sarvajñajñānabhūtā mañjuśrījñānakāya pratilambhāya, pariśuddhajñānā- darśabhūtā pañcacakṣupratilambhāya, ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrībhūtā āmiṣābhaya- dharmadānotsṛjanatayā daśabhūmipratilambabhūtā puṇyajñānasaṃbhārasamādhipari- pūraṇatayā, advayadharmatā dvayadharmaṃ vigatatvādatathatārūpatā, ananyadharmatādhyāro- pavigatatvāt, bhūtakoṭirūpatā pariśuddhasarvatathāgatajñānakāyasvabhāvatayā, sarvākāramahāśūnyatārūpatā aśeṣakudṛṣṭi gati gahana nirghātanatayā, sarvadharmāna- bhilāpya rūpeyaṃ nāmasaṃgītiḥ yadutādvaya dharmaṃtāvataraṇārthaṃ nāmasaṃghāraṇa- prakāśanatayā
analyzed: maṅkāra nirghātana karī sarva duḥkha daurmanasya anutpādana karī sarva tathāgatānām hṛdaya bhūtā sarva buddha bodhisattvānām guhya bhūtā sarvaṃśrāvaka pratyekabuddhānām rahasya bhūtā sarva mudrā sarva māṅgalyatamānām śaraṇam śaraṇa arthinām layanam layana arthinām trāṇam trāṇa arthinām parāyaṇam dvīpa bhūtā dvā upārthinām agatikānām anuttara gati bhūtā yānapātra bhūtā bhava sāgara ṣaṣ pāramitā paripūrībhūtā dharma dāna utsṛjanatayā daśa bhūmi pratilamba bhūtā puṇya jñāna saṃbhāra samādhi pari pūraṇatayā advaya dharmatā dvaya dharmam vigata tvāt atathatā rūpatā
iti tṛtīya cakrasya iyam anuśaṃsā padāni dvāpañcāśat

original: | punaraparaṃ vajrapāṇe vajraghara kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā mantramukhacaryācārī imāṃ bhagavato mañjuśrījñānasattvasya sarvatathāgata- jñānakāyasya bhagavato jñānamūrteradvayaparamārthaṃ nāmasaṅgīti nāmacūr̤āmaṇi kaṇikāsahitā sakalaparisamāptāmanyūnāmakhaṇḍāmebhireva gāthāpadavyañjanaiḥ pratyahaṃ trikālaṃ dhārayiṣyati, vācayiṣyati, paryavāpsyati, yoniśaśca manasi kariṣyati, parebhyaśca vistareṇa yathāsamayaṃ yathāvatsaṃprakāśayiṣyati, pratyekaṃ cānyatamānyatamaṃ nāmārthaṃ mañjuśrījñānakāyamālambanīkṛtya ekāgra- manasā bhāvayiṣyati, adhimuktitattvamanaskārābhyāṃ samanta mukhavihāra- vihārī sarvadharma prativedhikayā paramayā anāvilayā prajñāviddhayā śraddhayā samanvāgataḥ san tasya tryadhvābaddhasaṃginaḥ sarvabuddhabodhisattvāḥ saṃgamya samāgamya sarvadharmaṃmukhānyupadarśayiṣyanti, ātmabhāvaṃ copadarśayiṣyanti, sarvabuddhabodhisattvādhiṣṭhānaṃ ca sarvakāyavāṅmanobhistasya santāne 'citte samyagaghiṣṭhāsyanti, sarvabuddhabodhisattvānugraheṇa cānugrahīṣyanti, sarvadharma - vaiśāradyapratibhānaścopasaṃhariṣyanti, sarvārhacchrāvakapratyekabuddhāścāryaṃ dharma- pramāṇatayātmabhāvaṃ copadarśayiṣyanti durdāntadamakāśca mahākrodharājāno mahāvajradharādayo jagatparitrāṇabhūtā nānānirmāṇakāryarojobalaṃ tejo'pra- dhṛṣyatāṃ sarvaṃ mantramudrābhisamayamaṇḍalānyu pasaṃhariṣyanti, aśeṣāśca mantramahā- vidyārājñyaḥ sarvavighnavināyakamārāripratyaṅgirā mahāparājitāḥ sarā- trindivaṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ sarveryāpatheṣu rakṣāvaraṇagupti kariṣyanti ye ca brahmendro - pendrarudranārāyaṇa sanatkumāra maheśvara kārtikeyamahākāla nandikeśvarayama varuṇa kuverahāratī daśa diglokapālāśca te sarve satata saṃmitaṃ rātrindivaṃ gacchatastiṣṭhataḥ śayānasya niṣaṇṇasya svapato jāgrataḥ samāhitasyāsamā- hitasya ca ekākinā bahujanamadhyagatasya yāvad grāmanagaranigamajanapada- rāṣṭra rājadhānīgatasya indrakīla rathyāpratolovīthīnagaradvāra rājamārga catvara śṛṅgāṭakanagarāntarāpaṇapaṇyaśālāmadhyagatasya yāvacchūnyāgāragirikandara- - āryamañjuśrīnāmasaṅgītiḥ nadī va gahanopagatasya ucchiṣṭasyānucchiṣṭasya mattasya pramattasya sadā sarvathā rakṣāvaraṇa gupti kariṣyanti
analyzed: punar aparam vajrapāṇe vajraghara kaścid kula putraḥ vā kula duhitā vā mantra mukha caryā cārī imām bhagavataḥ mañjuśrī jñāna sattvasya sarva tathāgata jñānakāyasya bhagavataḥ jñāna mūrteḥ ekāgra manasā bhāvayiṣyati adhimukti tattva manaskārābhyām samanta mukha vihāra vihārī sarva dharma prativedhikayā paramayā anāvilayā prajñā viddhayā śraddhayā samanvāgataḥ san tasya tri adhva ābaddha sarva arhat śrāvaka pratyekabuddhāḥ ca āryam dharma pramāṇatayā ātmabhāvam ca upadarśayiṣyanti durdānta damakāḥ ca mahā krodha rājānaḥ mahāvajradhara ādayaḥ jagat paritrāṇa bhūtāḥ nānā nirmāṇa varuṇa kuvera hāratī daśa diglokapālāḥ ca te sarve satata saṃmitam rātriṃdivam gacchataḥ tiṣṭhataḥ śayānasya niṣaṇṇasya svapataḥ jāgrataḥ samāhitasya asamāḥ hitasya ca ekākinā bahu jana kariṣyanti

original: rātrindivaṃ ca paraṃ svastyayanaṃ kariṣyanti, ye cānye devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍa kinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyā ye cānye grahanakṣatra gaṇapatayo yāśca saptamātaro yāśca yakṣiṇīrākṣasīpiśācyastāḥ sarvāḥ sahitāḥ samagrāḥ sasenyāḥ saparivārāḥ sarveryāpatheṣu parāṃ rakṣāvaraṇa- gupti kariṣyanti paraṃ ca tasya kāye mojobalaṃ prakṣepsyanti ārogyamāyu- vṛddhi copasaṃhariṣyanti
analyzed: rātrindivam ca param svastyayanam kariṣyanti ye ca anye deva nāga yakṣa gandharva asura garuḍa kinnara mahoraga manuṣya amanuṣyāḥ ye ca anye graha nakṣatra gaṇapatayaḥ yāḥ ca sapta mātaraḥ
iti caturtha cakrasya iyam anuśaṃsā padāni ekonaviṃśatiḥ

original: | punaraparaṃ vajrapāṇe vajradhara ya imāṃ nāmasaṅgīti nāmacūḍāmaṇi pratyahamakhaṇḍasamāghānatastrikṛtvā kaṇṭhagatāmāvartayiṣyati, pustakagatāṃ vā paṭhamānaḥ pravartayiṣyati, bhagavato mañjuśrījñānasattvasya rūpamālambayan, tadrūpamanucintayan tadrūpamanuṣyāyan tameva rūpaṃ nirmāṇakāyenācirādeva vinayavaṃśamupādāya rakṣati, gaganatalagatāśca buddhabodhisattvāḥ nānā- nirmāṇarūpakāyeṃ: sahagatā rakṣanti, na ca tasya sattvasya jātu kathamapi durgatyapāyapatanaṃ bhaviṣyati, na nīcakulopapattirbhaviṣyati, na pratyanta- janapadopapattirbhaviṣyati na honendriyo bhaviṣyati, na mithyādṛṣṭikulo- papattirbhaviṣyati, nābuddhakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣūtpatsyate, na ca buddhotpādavi mukhatā taddeśitadharmavimukhaparokṣatā bhaviṣyati na ca dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūtpasyate, na ca durbhikṣarogaśastrāntaḥ kalpeṣūtpatsyate, na ca pañcakaṣāyakāleṣūtpatsyate, na ca rājaśatrucorabhayaṃ bhaviṣyati na sarvopakaraṇavaikalyadāridryabhayaṃ bhaviṣyati, nāślokābhyākhyānanindāyaśo'kīrtibhayaṃ bhaviṣyati, sujāti- kulagotra sampannaśca bhaviṣyati, samantaprāsādikarūpavarṇasamanvāgataśca bhaviṣyati, priyo mana āpaḥ paramasukhasaṃvāsaḥ, priyadarśanaśca lokānāṃ bhaviṣyati, śubhasaubhāgyādeyavākyaśca lokānāṃ bhaviṣyati, yatra yatro - amṛtakaṇikāsahitā papatsyate, tatra tatra jātismaro bhaviṣyati, mahābhoga: mahāparīvāro'kṣaya- parīvāraśca bhaviṣyati, agraṇīḥ sarvasattvānāmagraguṇasamanvāgato bhaviṣyati, prakṛtyā ca ṣaṭpāramitāguṇa samanvāgato bhaviṣyati, caturbrahmavihāra vihārī bhaviṣyati, smṛtisaṃprajanyopāyabalapraṇidhi jñānasamanvāgataśca bhaviṣyati, sarvaśāstraviśārado vāgmī ca bhaviṣyati, spaṣṭavāgajaḍaḥ paṭuśca bhaviṣyati, dakṣo'nalasaḥ saṃtuṣṭo mahārtho vitṛṣṇaśca bhaviṣyati, parama- viśvāsī ca sarvasattvānāmācārya gurusaṃmataśca bhaviṣyati, ca tasya sarvaśilpakalābhijñājñānaśāstrāṇi cārthato granthataśca pratibhā- samāgamiṣyanti, supariśuddha śolājīva samudācāracārī ca bhaviṣyati, supravrajitaḥ rūpasaṃpannaśca bhaviṣyati, apramuṣitasarvajñatā bodhicittaśca bhaviṣyati, na jātu śrāvakātpratyeka buddha niyamāva krāntigataśca bhaviṣyati
analyzed: punar aparam vajrapāṇe vajradhara yaḥ imām nāma saṅgī iti nāma cūḍāmaṇi pratyaham akhaṇḍa samāghānataḥ tri kṛtvā kaṇṭha gatām āvartayiṣyati pustaka gatām vā paṭhamānaḥ pravartayiṣyati janapada upapattiḥ bhaviṣyati na hona indriyaḥ bhaviṣyati na mithyādṛṣṭi kula upapattiḥ bhaviṣyati na abuddhakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu utpatsyate na ca buddha utpāda vi mukha tā tad deśita dharma vimukha samanta prāsādika rūpa varṇa samanvāgataḥ ca bhaviṣyati priyaḥ manaḥ āpaḥ parama sukha saṃvāsaḥ priya darśanaḥ ca lokānām bhaviṣyati śubha saubhāgya ādeya vākyaḥ ca lokānām bhaviṣyati yatra sarva śāstra viśāradaḥ vāgmī ca bhaviṣyati spaṣṭa vāc ajaḍaḥ paṭuḥ ca bhaviṣyati dakṣaḥ nalasaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ mahārthaḥ vitṛṣṇaḥ ca bhaviṣyati parama viśvāsī ca sarva sattvānām ācārya
iti pañcama cakrasya iyam anuśaṃsā pādāni ekapañcāśat

original: | evaṃ vajrapāṇe vajradhara aprameyaguṇasamanvāgato'so mantramukhacaryā - cārī bhaviṣyati, anyeścāprameyerevaṃ prakārairguṇagaṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhaviṣyati, acirādeva vajrapāṇe vajradhara paramārthanāmasaṅgītisaṃdhārakaḥ puruṣapudgalaḥ susaṃbhṛtapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāraḥ kṣiprataraṃ buddhaguṇānsamudānīyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbo- cimabhisaṃbhotsyate analpakalpāparinirvāṇadharmāṇāṃ sarvasattvānāmanuttara- dharmaṃdeśako'dhiṣṭhātā daśadiksaddharma dundubhirdhamaṃgajaḥ
analyzed: evam vajrapāṇe vajradhara aprameya guṇa samanvāgataḥ saḥ mantra mukha caryā cārī bhaviṣyati anyeḥ ca aprameyeḥ evam prakāraiḥ guṇa gaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ bhaviṣyati acirāt eva vajrapāṇe vajradhara
iti ṣaṣṭha cakrasya iyam anuśaṃsā prameyā
idānīm anuśaṃsā padānām api kiyat api vibhajyate

original: | iyamasāviti sākṣādanubhūyamāna- sukhādhigatitvena prakṛtiprabhāsvaratvājjñānamūttiḥ nāmasaṃgītiḥ sahajānubhūtiḥ nityaṃ sahajaśuddhasvabhāvatvena pañcakāmopabhoge'pi kleśāmiśratvādāveṇikapariśuddhā anuttara- aprameyāni
analyzed: iyam asau iti sākṣāt anubhūyamāna sukha adhigati tvena prakṛti prabhāsvara tvāt jñānam ūttiḥ nāma saṃgītiḥ sahaja anubhūtiḥ nityam sahaja śuddha svabhāva tvena pañca kāma upabhoge kleśa
āyam mañjuśrī nāma saṅgītiḥ
mārga tvāt anuttara prītiḥ

original: anubhūyamānanimittatvena prasādasaṃdarśanāt (saṃjananāt ) mahodvilo bodhicittavastrasvabhāvatvena kāyavāṅmanoguhyabhūtā 'saddharmanetrī prajñāpāramitā tasyāḥ sandhāraṇamadvayajñānarūpatāpādanaṃ ṣaḍaṅgayogena saṃvṛttiparamārthasvarūpabodhicittavajrasya prakāśanād deśitetyādi pada-ṣaṭkaṃ adhiṣṭhānaṃ sthirīkaraṇaṃ ṣaṭcakravattitvātprathama- cakrasyānuśaṃsābhāvāt
analyzed: anubhūyamāna nimitta tvena prasāda saṃdarśanāt saṃjananāt mahodvilaḥ bodhi citta vastra svabhāva tvena kāya vāc manaḥ guhya bhūtā saddharma netrī prajñāpāramitā tasyāḥ sandhāraṇam advaya
sarva ākāra śūnyatā svabhāva tvāt gharmaṃghātu gatiḥ
daśa vidha dhūma ādi nimitta bala yogāt daśa bala bali tā
mahā sukha tvena āgamanāt āgamaḥ
an ābhoge na adhigama rūpa tvāt
sarva prapañca rahita tvena vimala tvam
śūnyatvena nirmāṇa kāya buddha bimba darśanāt prasūtiḥ
pariśuddha nāḍī cakra ātmaka tvāt kṣetram

original: phalarūpeṇa sthitatvāt pratiṣṭhā, saṃvṛtirmahāyānaṃ paramārthe vastrayānam
analyzed: phala rūpeṇa sthita tvāt pratiṣṭhā saṃvṛtiḥ mahāyānam paramārthe vastra yānam
caryā virodha bodha rūpa tvāt bodhisattva caryā
paryavasāna prāpti hetu tvāt niṣṭhā
tatva parīkṣā sthāna tvāt nikaṣaḥ
viśiṣṭa niryāṇa upāya tvāt utpattiḥ
anābhogena tathāgata kṛtya karaṇāt anucchedaḥ
prabhāsvarā adhiṣṭhānāt pravṛddhiḥ
vyāpaka tvāt saṃgrahaḥ
acintya rūpa tvāt samādhiḥ
prajñā ādi pañca vidha dhyāna rūpa tvāt dhyānam
jñāna mātra ālaya tvāt yogaḥ
vikalpānām nirābhāsanāt prahāṇam
rāga ādi bandhana a pagama hetu tvāt muktiḥ
samyak jñāna svabhāva tvāt mokṣaḥ
sahaja sukha vihāri tvāt śāntaḥ
prabhāsvara tvena ākaraḥ
sarva vipattīnām sarva doṣāṇām takṣaṇa rūpa tvāt parihāṇiḥ
pidhānam apāya dvārāṇām naraka preta tiryagātma apāya dvārāṇām
samyak bodhi mārga tvāt sat pathaḥ
pratītyasamutpāda vicchedāt apravṛtti
yathā bhavya tayā dharmacakra pravartana hetu tvāt pravarttanam
vajra yāna tvena śrāvaka ādi vijaya rūpa tvā duchrita chatra dhvaja patākā
yoga sthirīkaraṇa hetu tvāt adhiṣṭhānam

original: mantramukhacaryā - cāriṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mantrapadapāṭhādinā prāpteḥ kṣiprasiddhiḥ
analyzed: mantra mukha caryā cāriṇām bodhisattvānām mantra pada pāṭha ādinā prāpteḥ kṣipra siddhiḥ
sākṣātkāra rūpa tvāt bhāvanā ghigamaḥ
śūnyatā viśeṣa siddhānta rūpa tvāt śūnyatā prativedhaḥ
phala hetu ātmaka tayā dvaya prativedha abhiyuktānām nirvikalpa prativedha rūpa tvāt pariśuddhaḥ
advaya jñāna tvāt sarva dharma eka citta prativedhaḥ

original: durnimittaṃ mṛtyucihnādi devaputrādeḥ śukrā ( sūkarā ) di kusyutpattyartha ( pādi ) - malina vāsanādi duḥśakunam
analyzed: durnimittam mṛtyu cihna ādi deva putra ādeḥ duḥśakunam
sarva
utkarṣa cetasaḥ paryādānam madaḥ
citta samunnatiḥ mānaḥ
atimānaḥ dapaḥ

original: ahaṃkṛtiḥ mahaṅkāraḥ kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ mānasikaṃ daurmanasyam
analyzed: ahaṃkṛtiḥ mahaṅkāraḥ kāyikam duḥkham mānasikam daurmanasyam
tathāgata nirjāta tvāt hṛdaya bhūtā
mantra naya krameṇa evam prakāśya tvāt rahasya bhūtā

original: ārogyaṃ nīrogatā, balaṃ kāyikaṃ sāmarthyamaiśvaryaṃ hastyādisampat dhanadhānyādi
analyzed: ārogyam nīroga tā balam kāyikam sāmarthyam aiśvaryam hasti ādi sampad dhana dhānya ādi
śroḥ a dvaya tvāt
śubham daśa kuśala pradhāna tvāt
śāntiḥ yaḥ ga abhyāsāt
kalyāṇam ādi madhya anta maṅgala tvāt
kīrtiḥ a bhiṣeka ādi prakāśanāt
ślokaḥ buddhatva dāyaka tvāt
stutiḥ māgaṃdānena
aṣṭānavati kleśāḥ sarva vyādhayaḥ
